meanings.definition: The quality or state of being butch.
meanings.sent1: Her butchness was evident in the way she carried herself.
meanings.sent2: His butchness was admired by his friends.
meanings.sent3: The cat's butchness was unexpected but amusing.
meanings.sent4: The mountain's butchness loomed over the valley.
meanings.sent5: The butchness of the old tree made it stand out in the forest.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being masculine in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The wrestler's butchness was intimidating to his opponents.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, butchness is associated with strength and power.
meanings.sent3: The dog's butchness was comical when it tried to act tough.
meanings.sent4: The storm's butchness was evident in its fierce winds.
meanings.sent5: The butchness of the lion made it the king of the jungle.
